channel.title: Making left click npc's trade (e.g Santa)
channel.description:
I seen this on pimpscape, thought it was awesome, decided to try it myself.
I have set up a shop, set Santa to the npc, however left click "talk" doesn't open a trade screen. How does one make it so left click = trade screen? Thanks in advance for help =-)

item.title: Making left click npc's trade (e.g Santa)
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

it not like ur normal shops

u gota search for should for for pimpscape search for IN CLIENT.JAVA

else if (NPCID == 1001) // Mage Of Zamorak
{
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 1001;
}

then at } press enter

type in

else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = **;
}

so at ** type in shop number e.g myn is 46… NPCID == 1552) is santa… and basicly tht it
so shuld look like

else if (NPCID == 1001) // Mage Of Zamorak
{
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 1001;
} 
else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santas holiday stuff
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 46;
}

basicly tht how to make ur shops wuiv a npc u cnt trade wiv … but wiv a npc who u can tlk to

ma shop is

shop = 46 santa's_holiday_stuff 2 2 7336 1 7462 1 3105 1 1048 1 1050 1 1038 1 1040 1 1042 1 1044 1 1046 1 1037 1 1057 1 1055 1 1053 1 6611 1 1961 1 1959 1 1187 1 3140 1 4087 1 4585 1 1149 1 6858 1 6860 1 6862 1 6856 1 6859 1 6861 1 6863 1 6857 1 4084 100 6583 555
